changeSet.author: astrauss
changeSet.sql: insert into QATREE_OUTCOME_DEFECT_SOURCE (QATREE_OUTCOME_ID, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TS, DEFECT_SOURCE_ID) select '194BEEF0-A866-4EEB-9EE2-2245900340AA','C20225',getdate(),DEFECT_SOURCE_ID from DEFECT_SOURCE where DEFECT_CD = 'LA' and DEFECT_SOURCE_CD = '5'

changeSet.author: astrauss
changeSet.sql: delete from QATREE_OUTCOME_DEFECT_CAUSE where QATREE_OUTCOME_ID = 'BDB264B0-2C23-41A1-BE74-E90B7CC980A5' and DEFECT_CAUSE_ID in (select DEFECT_CAUSE_ID from DEFECT_CAUSE where DEFECT_CD = 'LA' and DEFECT_CAUSE_CD = 'C')
